words.def: a narrow thin strip of wood used as backing for plaster or to make latticework
the state of inactivity following an interruption
headdress that protects the head from bad weather
angular distance above the horizon (especially of a celestial object)
a broad flat muscle on either side of the back
An instance of the interjection ah.
(astronomy) the angular distance of a celestial point measured westward along the celestial equator from the zenith crossing
The Indian mulberry , , especially as used to make dye.
a highly unstable radioactive element (the heaviest of the halogen series)
a white soft metallic element that tarnishes readily
a hard grey lustrous metallic element that is highly resistant to corrosion
